ServiceAppointmentEvent.name: ServiceAppointmentEvent
ServiceAppointmentEvent.description: Notifies subscribers of the service appointment details that are generated from the event platform.

AsgnRsrcApptSchdDtlEvent.description: One or multiple assigned resource records related to the scheduler appointment event.

ChangeType.description: The operation that caused the change. For example: CREATE, UPDATE, DELETE.

EventUuid.description: A universally unique identifier (UUID) that identifies a platform event message.

ReplayId.description: Represents an ID value that is populated by the system and refers to the position of the event in the event stream. Replay ID values arenâ€™t guaranteed to be contiguous for consecutive events. A subscriber can store a replay ID value and use it on resubscription to retrieve missed events that are within the retention window.

ServiceApptSchduleEvent.description: The service appointment related to the scheduler appointment event.
